subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Nabokov made 18 saves for a shutout, John Tavares scored his 17th goal, and the visiting Islanders beat the Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-0.
snippet: Evgeni Nabokov made 18 saves for a shutout, John Tavares scored his 17th goal, and the visiting Islanders beat the Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-0.
